Cc: Grace Milan <Grace.Milan@chalhoub.com>; Government Affairs <Government.Affairs@chalhoub.com>; May Karaki <May.Karaki@chalhoub.com>; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>; Connie Madeira <Connie.Madeira@chalhoub.com>; Mary Janice Dofeliz <MaryJanice.Dofeliz@chalhoub.com>; Sharon Pinto <Sharon.Pinto@chalhoub.com>; Rebecca Lane <RLane@amrc.ae>
Subject: Max Mara, Unit 140SU, The Galleria Al Maryah Island - Civil Defense Request

 

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Dear Natasha,

 

We would be grateful if you would kindly forward a copy of your Civil Defence certificate to us for your unit at The Galleria.

 

We would like to take this opportunity to remind that you are obliged to obtain and at all times maintain your Civil Defence Certificate under the terms of your Lease.

 

Please let me know if you have any questions

 

 

Regards,
